session_targeting_rules.description: Rules defining the criteria for targeting users during session recordings

id.description: Unique identifier for the parent rule

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the rule

scope.description: Scope or context in which the rule is applied

conditions.description: Specific conditions that must be met for the rule to apply

op.description: Comparison operator used to evaluate the attribute

values.description: Possible values that will be evaluated for the condition

str_val.description: String value used in the comparison

int_val.description: Integer value used in the comparison

version_val.description: Version value used in the comparison

join_previous.description: Boolean indicator determining how this condition is related to the previous condition

children.description: Nested rules or conditions to be evaluated in conjunction with the parent rule

id.description: Unique identifier for the child rule

join_previous.description: Boolean indicator determining how this child rule is related to the previous rule
